summary: John Pilger tells of their struggles of indigenous Australians as they were driven from their lands and he follows events throughout this century as they relate to Aboriginal rights.
cast: John Pilger|Vince Forrester|Mario Fredericks|Bob Hawke|Fred Hollows|Marcia Langton|Yami Lester|Bobby Randall|Freda Thornton|Margaret Tucker|Gough Whitlam
title: The Secret Country: The First Australians Fight Back
